extension.name: FavSlider Responsive Slideshow
extension.author: FavThemes
extension.description:
FavSlider is a free responsive Joomla! module that let's you use images and video to create a slideshow with 4 default layouts and customize each slide with 100+ module parameters. For more info, please see the demo and documentation for the FavSlider module.



Copyright © 2012-2015 FavThemes.

field.name: sliderType
field.label: Slider Type
field.description: Choose one of the 4 preset slider types.

field.name: jqueryLoad
field.label: Load Joomla! jQuery
field.description: Load Joomla! jQuery library. Choose 'No' if your instance loads jQuery from an eternal source.

field.name: animationEffect
field.label: Transition Effect
field.description: Choose between FADE or SLIDE animation types for the slides.

field.name: slideHeight
field.label: Slide Height
field.description: Set a fixed height for the slideshow in pixels (for example: 14, not 14px). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: thumbHeight
field.label: Thumbnail Height
field.description: Set a fixed height for the thumbnails in pixels (for example: 14, not 14px). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: linkTarget
field.label: URLs Target
field.description: Select the link target for the slides.

field.name: arrowNav
field.label: Arrow Navigation
field.description: Navigate between slides using the previous/next arrows.

field.name: arrowNavStyle
field.label: Arrows Style
field.description: Select the navigation arrows style.

field.name: controlNav
field.label: Control Navigation
field.description: Navigate between slides using the control buttons.

field.name: slideshow
field.label: Autorun
field.description: This option can animate the slider automatically. Will only work for a non-video slideshow.

field.name: randomize
field.label: Randomize
field.description: Randomize the order of the slides.

field.name: animationLoop
field.label: Animation Loop
field.description: Should the animation loop? If false, previous/next navigation receive disable classes at either end.

field.name: pauseOnHover
field.label: Pause On Hover
field.description: Pause the slideshow when hovering over slider, then resume when no longer hovering over the slides. Will only work for a non-video slideshow.

field.name: keyboardNav
field.label: Keyboard Navigation
field.description: Navigate between slides using the keyboard left/right keys.

field.name: mousewheel
field.label: Mouse Navigation
field.description: Navigate between slides using the mousewheel.

field.name: slideshowSpeed
field.label: Cycling Speed
field.description: Set the speed of the slideshow cycling, in milliseconds. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionHide
field.label: Caption Hide
field.description: Select the devices on which the caption should be visible on.

field.name: layoutEffect
field.label: Caption Effects
field.description: Choose a CSS3 effect for the slideshow caption on page scroll and load.

field.name: captionTextAlign
field.label: Caption Text Align
field.description: Select the text align for the content of the caption.

field.name: captionStyle
field.label: Caption Style
field.description: Select the caption style for the slides.

field.name: captionBgStyle
field.label: Caption Background Style
field.description: Select the caption background style for the slides.

field.name: captionWidth
field.label: Caption Width
field.description: Set the width for caption. Please insert the number using pixels(px), percent(%) or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionHeight
field.label: Caption Height
field.description: Set the height for caption. Please insert the number using pixels(px), percent(%) or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionTitleGoogleFont
field.label: Caption Title Google Font
field.description: Copy the Google Web Font name for the caption title here, for example Open Sans or Lato. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionTitleFontSize
field.label: Caption Title Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the caption title. Please insert the number using pixels(px), percent(%) or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionTitleTextTransform
field.label: Caption Title Text Transform
field.description: Set the text transform for the caption title.

field.name: captionTitlePadding
field.label: Caption Title Padding
field.description: Set the padding for the caption title. Please insert the number using pixels(px), percent(%) or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionTitleMargin
field.label: Caption Title Margin
field.description: Set the margin for the caption title. Please insert the number using pixels(px), percent(%) or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionDescriptionGoogleFont
field.label: Caption Description Google Font
field.description: Copy the Google Web Font name for the caption description here, for example Open Sans or Lato. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionDescriptionFontSize
field.label: Caption Description Font Size
field.description: Set the font size for the caption description. Please insert the number using pixels(px), percent(%) or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionReadMoreColor
field.label: Caption Read More Color
field.description: Set the color for the read more link. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionReadMoreBgColor
field.label: Caption Read More Background Color
field.description: Set the background color for the read more link. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionReadMoreGoogleFont
field.label: Caption Read More Google Font
field.description: Copy the Google Web Font name for the caption read more link here, for example Open Sans or Lato. A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionReadMorePadding
field.label: Caption Read More Padding
field.description: Set the padding for the caption read more link. Please insert the number using pixels(px), percent(%) or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: captionReadMoreMargin
field.label: Caption Read More Margin
field.description: Set the margin for the caption read more link. Please insert the number using pixels(px), percent(%) or em (for example: 14px, not 14). A blank field reverts the setting to the default value.

field.name: file1active
field.label: Slide 1 Show
field.description: Choose if the slide should be displayed or not.

field.name: file1type
field.label: Slide 1 Type
field.description: Choose if the slide should display an image or a video.

field.name: file1
field.label: Slide 1 Image Location or Video ID (YouTube/Vimeo)
field.description: Full path of the image file, without the leading slash (ex.: images/myfile.jpg) or a valid YouTube/Vimeo video ID (ex.: abcde for an URL like https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=abcde or 12345 for an URL like https://vimeo.com/12345). Leave a blank field to disable this setting.

field.name: file1alt
field.label: Slide 1 Image Alt
field.description: Image ALT tag for this slide (only applicable for images). Leave a blank field to disable this setting.

field.name: file1link
field.label: Slide 1 Image Link
field.description: URL for this slide (only applicable for images). Leave a blank field to disable this setting.

field.name: file1favtitle
field.label: Slide 1 Image Title Text
field.description: Title text for this slide (only applicable for images). Leave a blank field to disable this setting.

field.name: file1favdescription
field.label: Slide 1 Image Description Text
field.description: Description text for this slide (only applicable for images). Leave a blank field to disable this setting.

field.name: file1favreadmore
field.label: Slide 1 Image Read More Text
field.description: Read More text for this slide (only applicable for images). Leave a blank field to disable this setting.
